arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach's Tim Kleindienst gets the better of best man Kevin Müller
arts.sum: Kleindienst's star has seemingly been on a continuous rise in recent years and, on the back of his first two Germany caps, the 29-year-old led the line for Gladbach at home against former club Heidenheim on Saturday afternoon. Everything seems to be going right for Borussia Mönchengladbach striker Tim Kleindienst at the moment - not even his best man Kevin Müller could escape his goalscoring wrath on Saturday afternoon!

arts.ttl: Gladbach vs. Heidenheim preview: Kleindienst faces former club
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach forward Tim Kleindienst will look to continue his impressive start to the season when he faces his former club on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Borussia Monchengladbach vs. Heidenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Monchengladbach and Heidenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
